description:
The Sniper King hatches a daring escape plan, but the assassins of CP9 are more powerful than our heroes ever imagined. Meanwhile, Luffy and the gang run into a very familiar frog!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bataille pour reprendre Robin ! L`ingénieux stratagème de Sniperking !
Scramble Over Robin! A Cunning Plan by Sniper King!
تهافت على روبين. خطّة سوغيكينغ الماكرة
ロビン争奪戦! そげキングの奇策!!
